name: Bookmark Server base on PHPNuke
short_description:
The goals of this systems are following:
1. User can maintain his bookmarks.
2. User has private bookmark counter.
3. User can create categories of his own.
4. User can see his bookmarks without login.
5. User can see bookmarks of his friends.
6. Us
